#summary Graphics useful for developers.

== Category Icons ==

There are 20 categories of Plazes (airport, bar, cinema, etc.) and each one has an icon associated with it.  There's also an icon for "people" and one for "group."  These icons are [http://plazes.googlecode.com/files/PlazesCategoryIcons.zip available as GIF and PNG files], in two sizes (24x24 and 40x40):

[http://plazes.googlecode.com/files/PlazesIconGallery.png]
